name: Easy Youmu
description:
Note: If the Unity web player isn't working, you can download the standalone package named Easy Youmu Standalone.zip

Welcome to the 3rd game of the "Formidable" Touhou fangame series.
Check out the other two below:
Formidable Alice: https://kurantob.itch.io/formidable-alice
Formidable Patchouli: https://kurantob.itch.io/formidable-patchouli

Game Description

This is a romance visual novel where you play as Marisa who engages in dialogue with Youmu. Youmu is so obviously head-over-heels for you, and you must save her from herself!

Also, this series started out as an entry in one of the jams hosted by Touhou Fan Game Jam group (Twitter: @TouhouFanJam), the theme at the time being Pride / Identity. Be sure to give them a follow!
